subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: In the bottom of the ninth, with two runners on, Casey McGehee hit a single that ricocheted off Gonzalez Germen, taking the Marlins to a win against the Mets.
snippet: In the bottom of the ninth, with two runners on, Casey McGehee hit a single that ricocheted off Gonzalez Germen, taking the Marlins to a win against the Mets.
